CHAT.comment: HILLSIDE DAIRY, INC., A&A DAIRY, L&S DAIRY, AND MILKY WAY FARMS, Petitioners v. WILLIAM J. LYONS, JR., SECRETARY, CALIFORNIA DEPARTMENT OF FOOD AND AGRICULTURE, ET AL.; and PONDEROSA DAIRY, PAHRUMP DAIRY, ROCKVIEW DAIRIES, INC., AND D. KUIPER DAIRY, Petitioners v. WILLIAM J. LYONS, JR., SECRETARY, CALIFORNIA DEPARTMENT OF FOOD AND AGRICULTURE, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:10 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ROY T. ENGLERT, JR. ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF BARBARA B. McDOWELL ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MARK J. URBAN ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF ROY T. ENGLERT, JR. ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 12:03 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
